text: The supreme evil is back, rather unsubtle with his huge pyramid and huge hat.
The First of the Vampires is an ancient and wicked soul, a beguiling and terrifying foe.
Ancient angels of Ptra, Nagash's pettiness in victory. The Morghasts are intelligent and powerful servants of the Great Necromancer.
The most powerful Hammurai of Ptra are turned into willing emissaries of Nagash, spearheads of doom.
The tireless watch of Nagashizzar, ancient blades sharpened on Skaven skulls.
Powerful wights and guards of Nagash's fortress, vicious and strong enough to cut intruders and human cattle in half.
Bones are certainly a resource in abonedance.
Nightmarish constructs built of stone, metal and bone walk the halls of Nagashizzar, graceless bodies devoted to a single murderous purpose.
Whatever beasts these used to be, they had big fangs and bigger claws, only made sharper in undeath.
For too long these Ghouls have lived in the Dhar-saturated warpstone mines of Nagashizzar.
Spirits of death, wielding tools of death, riding on birds of death. Nagash isn't one for inspiration.
Ancient Tomb unearthed by powers of Black Pyramid, containing an endless supply of skeletons.
Spirit Hosts are a common sight amongst the armies of the dead, a horde of ethereal ghosts that swarm across the battlefield.
Spectres are in many ways the malevolent counterparts of Ghosts, angry beings full of malice for the living and despair at their own state.
Walk through the dark sepulchral forests and woodlands of the world and you will hear the wails of the disembodied spirits that haunt these locations.
